title: Chelsea transfer news: Kostas Manolas’ agent speaks out over Man Utd and Blues rumours | Metro News
text:
Tom Olver for Metro.co.uk Thursday 23 Feb 2017 10:57 pm Kostas Manolas is on the radar of both Chelsea and Manchester United (Picture: Getty) 
Kostas Manolas ‘ agent has responded following speculation linking the centre-back with a move to either Chelsea or Manchester United . Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
The 25-year-old Greece defender has made 116 appearances for Roma since 2014 and is being watched by a number of top European clubs ahead of the summer transfer window. 
Manolas, who is tied into a deal at Roma until 2019, is yet to agree to a contract situation at the Stadio Olimpico but his representative, Ioannis Evangelopoulos, remains coy amid interest from England, Spain and France. 
‘There’s a lot of talk about his future,’ Evangelopoulos stated in an interview with FCInterNews. Both Jose Mourinho and Antonio Conte are keen on Kostas Manolas (Picture: Getty) 
‘So many voices, so many rumours, so many possible scenarios involving several teams. We talk about one club one day, the next it’s another. 
‘They talk about Juventus, Barcelona, Paris Saint-Germain, Chelsea, Manchester United… every day a different team.
